long_description: The sleek Cannondale CAAD10 3 compact women's road bike delivers race-ready performance for serious riders, thanks to a stiff, responsive frame decked out with a precise Shimano Ultegra drivetrain. 6069 aluminum CAAD10 frame offers responsive stiffness with impressive weight savings that rivals some carbon frames. Butted and shaped seatstays and chainstays help reduce side-to-side flex for energy efficiency while also helping make bumps and road vibrations less jarring. Lightweight all-carbon fork supplies great road performance, slicing through corners and damping road vibrations; tapered steerer enhances stiffness and responsiveness. Lightweight Shimano Ultegra derailleurs and shifters offer precise, dependable shifts throughout the 20 gear combinations. FSA SL-K Light carbon crankset is paired with an 11-28 tooth cassette for a capable gear range; BB30 bottom bracket enhances stiffness for more efficient power transfer. Mavic Aksium wheelset is decked out with fast Mavic Aksion tires for excellent handling and speed. Pedals not included. Cannondale CAAD10 3 compact women's road bike specs are subject to change.
short_description: The sleek Cannondale CAAD10 3 compact women's road bike delivers race-ready performance for serious riders, thanks to a stiff, responsive frame decked out with a precise Shimano Ultegra drivetrain.
